# Safeguarding Your Crypto Business

The category-definer for crypto-native  
market integrity solutions – trade surveillance, transaction monitoring, and
threat intelligence  

How it works

Trusted by crypto compliance teams and regulators globally

## Setting the Standards  
for the Financial Markets of Tomorrow

“Solidus’ passion and commitment to unlocking the potential of the crypto
industry is inspiring, and their work provides critical elements paramount for
safe crypto growth.”

Christopher Giancarlo

Former Chairman, US CFTC

## The Crypto-native DNA

New challenges call for new solutions

New Market Structures

24/7 operations, constant new assets and traders, new trading economics &
workflows  

Complex Data Structures

18 decimal points data,  
new levels of volatility,  
no standardization

Unique Threats & Typologies

Unprecedented cross-market challenges, DeFi manipulation and many unknown
unknowns

Evolving Regulatory Dynamics

Multi-jurisdictional reality, lacking regulatory clarity, intensifying
enforcement

### MEET OUR CRYPTO MARKET INTEGRITY PLATFORM

The only solution that combines on- and off-chain data to detect crypto crime,
fraud and market manipulation

Talk to an expert

#### Trade Surveillance  

Identify orders, executions, and DEX trades that defy the market norm

#### Transaction Monitoring  

Detect, investigate, and report suspicious crypto deposits and withdrawals

#### Threat Intelligence  

Flag scam tokens to protect your customers from DeFi fraud and your
organization from web3 money laundering risks

Trusted by compliance teams and regulators globally

70+ Typologies

Including crypto-specific risks

250+ Million

Daily events monitored

$16+ Trillion

Daily value analyzed

402,690

  Scam tokens

Detected so far

Subscribe to our weekly newsletter

See it in Action

Learn how Solidus Labs can help  
safeguard your crypto business
